statements: SELECT * FROM warehouse_layout;
SELECT aisle_id, aisle_number, product_name FROM warehouse_layout WHERE product_category = 'electronics';
SELECT aisle_id, aisle_capacity FROM warehouse_layout WHERE aisle_capacity > 50 ORDER BY aisle_capacity DESC;
SELECT product_name, product_category FROM warehouse_layout WHERE aisle_number = 3;
SELECT aisle_id, product_name FROM warehouse_layout WHERE product_name LIKE '%apple%' ORDER BY aisle_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM warehouse_layout WHERE product_category = 'Electronics';
SELECT aisle_number, aisle_capacity FROM warehouse_layout WHERE aisle_capacity > 1000 ORDER BY aisle_capacity DESC;
SELECT MAX(aisle_capacity) AS max_capacity FROM warehouse_layout;
SELECT aisle_id, COUNT(product_id) AS total_products FROM warehouse_layout GROUP BY aisle_id HAVING COUNT(product_id) > 3;
SELECT aisle_id, aisle_number, product_name FROM warehouse_layout ORDER BY aisle_number, product_name;
SELECT * FROM Warehouse;
SELECT id, location, capacity FROM Warehouse ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT name, category, quantity FROM Product WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT id, name, category, warehouse_id FROM Product WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT id, name, quantity FROM Product WHERE warehouse_id IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM Warehouse ORDER BY location DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT name, category, quantity FROM Product WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT id, location, capacity FROM Warehouse WHERE capacity < 500 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT p.name, w.location, p.quantity FROM Product p INNER JOIN Warehouse w ON p.warehouse_id = w.id WHERE p.quantity <= 50 ORDER BY p.quantity ASC;
SELECT * FROM Warehouse WHERE location LIKE 'A%' AND capacity > 200;
SELECT * FROM Warehouse;
SELECT warehouse_name, warehouse_location FROM Warehouse;
SELECT * FROM Product WHERE product_category = 'Electronics';
SELECT product_name, product_quantity FROM Product WHERE product_quantity > 50;
SELECT location_name FROM StorageLocation WHERE warehouse_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Warehouse;
SELECT product_name, product_quantity FROM Product WHERE product_quantity > 100;
SELECT warehouse_name, warehouse_location FROM Warehouse ORDER BY warehouse_location DESC;
SELECT product_name, product_category, product_quantity FROM Product WHERE product_category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY product_name ASC;

SELECT Warehouse.warehouse_name, Product.product_name, StorageLocation.location_name FROM Warehouse JOIN StorageLocation ON Warehouse.warehouse_id = StorageLocation.warehouse_id JOIN Product ON Product.product_category = 'Home'
SELECT * FROM warehouse;
SELECT id, location FROM shelf ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT name, category, price FROM product WHERE price > 50;
SELECT location, capacity FROM warehouse WHERE capacity >= 100 ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT p.name, ps.quantity, s.location FROM product p JOIN product_shelf_mapping ps ON p.id = ps.product_id JOIN shelf s ON ps.shelf_id = s.id;
SELECT * FROM warehouse;
SELECT name, category, price FROM product ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT id, location, capacity FROM shelf WHERE capacity > 10;
SELECT p.name, s.location, ps.quantity FROM product p JOIN product_shelf_mapping ps ON p.id = ps.product_id JOIN shelf s ON s.id = ps.shelf_id;
SELECT * FROM product_shelf_mapping WHERE product_id IN (SELECT id FROM product WHERE category = 'Electronics');
SELECT * FROM warehouse_layout;
SELECT warehouse_name, location FROM warehouse_layout WHERE warehouse_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, category_name FROM product INNER JOIN product_category ON product.category_id = product_category.category_id;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM product_storage WHERE bin_id = 100 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT warehouse_name, location FROM warehouse_layout ORDER BY warehouse_name ASC, location DESC;
SELECT * FROM warehouse_layout WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT product_name, category_name FROM product JOIN product_category ON product.category_id = product_category.category_id WHERE product.category_id = 1 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT warehouse_name, location, capacity FROM warehouse_layout INNER JOIN storage_bin ON warehouse_layout.warehouse_id = storage_bin.warehouse_id WHERE capacity > 100 ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT product_name, bin_id, quantity FROM product_storage JOIN product ON product_storage.product_id = product.product_id WHERE quantity > 0 ORDER BY quantity DESC, product_name ASC;
SELECT bin_id, COUNT(product_id) AS total_products FROM product_storage GROUP BY bin_id HAVING total_products > 2 ORDER BY total_products DESC, bin_id ASC;
